description: Experimental bases and general features of quantum physics. Selected topics from atomic, nuclear and solid state physics; laboratory experiments crucial to the development of modern physics. Advanced topics.
prerequisites: PHYS1001 + PHYS1002 + (MATH1051 or MATH1071) + (MATH1052 or MATH1072)
restricted: BAdvSc(Hons) students only or with permission of the course coordinator
